City Council
============

![Group Photo Chambers](https://www.dickinsontexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=5204 "Group Photo Chambers")

The legislative and governing body of the City of Dickinson consists of a mayor and six (6) councilmembers known as the City Council. The mayor and all councilmembers are elected from the city at large; the City of Dickinson does not have council "districts". Each member of council represents the entire city.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Members

* [Travis Magliolo](https://www.dickinsontexas.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=266), Mayor
* [Johnnie Simpson, Jr](https://www.dickinsontexas.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=189), Position Number 1
* [M. Shaun Holt](mailto:mholt@dickinsontexas.gov)[,](mailto:jsimsen@dickinsontexas.gov) Position Number 2
* [Mark Townsend](https://www.dickinsontexas.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=223), Position Number 3
* [Scott Shrader](mailto:sshrader@dickinsontexas.gov), Position Number 4
* [Bill Schick](https://www.dickinsontexas.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=224), Position Number 5
* [Kevin Edmonds](mailto:kedmonds@dickinsontexas.gov), Position Number 6

Meetings
--------

* 7 p.m.
* 2nd & 4th Tuesdays of each month (as of June 24, 2025)
* City Hall  
  4403 Highway 3  
  Dickinson, TX 77539

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](http://tx-dickinson.civicplus.com/AgendaCenter/City-Council-7)

All agenda, minutes, and other related materials will be accessible when available.
